--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, John Arrowwood <jarrowwx@g...> wrote:
> Actually, something to think about...
> The way he is doing this, he is basically evolving a formula, not a
> controller.  Like a fractal, math that appeals to the eye.
> 
> The roving eye changes it to a totally different animal. :)
> 
> 

Yes, true.  Both have their appeal.  But the cool thing about a 
roving pen is that it's human-like.  Early generations will be 
scribbles like little kids do, and perhaps as evolution progresses 
the scribbles will start looking like something.

ken
